alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Canyon Ferry Area; Gates of the Mountains; Helena Valley; Meagher County Valleys; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 1:43PM MDT until November 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph, with gusts up to 70 mph, are expected. Localized wind gusts to 80 mph are possible in wind prone areas. * WHERE...Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains, Canyon Ferry Area, Gates of the Mountains, Helena Valley, Meagher County Valleys and Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles or those pulling trailers.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Canyon Ferry Area; Gates of the Mountains; Helena Valley; Meagher County Valleys; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass
